name: EcoNaut
description: Promotes global sustability by encouraging the construction of clean energy sources.
Features AI to predict wind and solar energy productions based on meterological data.
Models trained using Random Forest and Artificial Neural Networks.
Visualizes predictions with charts and graphs.

name: To-do List
description: Inpsired by Trello; Allows users to organize their tasks into lists with Drag and Drop capabilities.
Draggable tasks can be moved between lists and reordered within the same list.

name: Chat Room
description: Enter a room of up to 10 users and chat in real-time.
Implements REST API leveraging MongoDB for user authentication and temporary authorization tokens.
Protected chat rooms that can only be entered while inputting a room name.

name: Motor Munchies
description: Discover registered food truck locations in your area. Advertise your food truck to the public.
Interact with Google Maps' API to see information about each vendor.
Sign up as a vendor to access a dashboard to create and manage your food truck's profile.

name: DonkeyType
description: A take on the popular typing test game, MonkeyType. Made minimal with preserved user experience.
Receive statistical feedback on your typing performance, such as speed and accuracy.

name: View More Projects
description: Want to see more of my projects? Check out my GitHub profile!
